data.title: Very nice hotel!
data.text: Sams town hotel and casino was very nice. It was clean, updated, and very tastefully decorated. The staff was friendly. We were on the 18th floor. Had a nice view of the city. We did not have to leave the hotel because all amenities were right there. Had breakfast at smokey joes and dinner at the buffet. I would recommend this hotel and casino to anyone. Loved our stay!

data.title: You get what you pay for
data.text: Overall, the stay was okay. Check in for fast and speedy but the hotel staff member wasn't pleasant at all. She never smiled. She never explained if we had any rewards or promotions for our stay. No mention about the amenities. The telephone lines are horrible. There's cross talk on every call you place. They really need to get this fixed. The valet needs to pay closer attention to detail. I left my car with the valet driver on Saturday night. They claim that I took my key with me but the key remained in the car. So my car sat out in front of the hotel unlocked over night....in Shreveport. This is totally unacceptable. Did they even bother to look for the key? I'll be trying a different casino hotel in Shreveport next time.

data.title: A nice spur of the moment visit
data.text: When our cruise was cancelled in Galveston we decided to head home and stop along  the way in Shreveport.  Sam's Town was the first casino hotel we came to and looked nice so we gave it a try.  The staff was very nice and helpful.  The room was huge and had a nice layout.  The beds were awesome, for some reason I found them to be more comfortable than any I've slept in in a while.

data.title: Staff needs work
data.text: Overall, our stay was good. We were passing through and only stayed one night. The room was clean, beds were comfy. However, the staff need a pep talk. Tera was the only staff member that seemed to care and have personality. Especially the ones down in the restaurant. No personality, acted like we were bothering them because we were ordering dessert to take back up to the room. It also took 20 minutes to get the desserts and both desserts were missing all toppings 😞.

data.title: A Most Pleasurable Stay
data.text: Travelling the US from England stopped the night at Sams Town loved it room first class and all staff we met in the casino and reception had wonderful customer service attitude and all done with a smile well done to all the team.Would love to come back in the future

data.title: Enjoyed my stay
data.text: The hotel room is pretty large in size. The bed was very comfortable. Loved the room service. To make this a 5 star review they would need to add a mini fridge. Parking was close to the hotel. If your here for casino's this area is the place.

data.title: Nice visit
data.text: We stayed 10/19/16 and we got a nice comp room from our friends who are frequent Sams Town visitors.  The parking is good with either a free parking garage, or if you choose,  a valet service. The lobby is beautiful and staff is courteous and helpful.  Our room was on the 4th floor with a partial water view.  The room was very large and very clean. There was a issue with the bathtub drain backing up which was brought to management's attention at checkout and they were very apologetic and said they would get it fixed immediately and would we like to be compensated? We declined, (how do you compensate a free room?) We ate at the restaurant in the hotel (excellent!), I personally did not go into the casino due to it allowing smoking which I can not be around.  My husband did visit casino with his friends and had a good time, and walking away winning!! It was a nice visit although so short, we would come back to Sam's Town again.

data.title: Just like Home!
data.text: From the moment you make you reservations until you check-out you feel taken care of.  The staff in the hotel, casino and restaurants is friendly, helpful and warm.  It is the most relaxing times staying at Sam's Town.  If you like potato soup, you must try the soup at Smokey Joe's!

data.title: SAMS TOWN
data.text: One of absolute worst casinos in Shreveport.Very Nice rooms and restaurants, yet the casino is sorry and smells. See is terrible and the dealers dont smile or say hello Justt awful.So many other choices right next door.No pool yet.the roos are very nice.

data.title: Rooms are clean and well maintained staff are friendly
data.text:
I love staying at Sam's Town, the rooms are always clean and very well maintained. 
This last trip was a comp room which made my stay even better, had an amazing view of the river which was pretty neat for a comp room.
Casino is a lot of fun the only downer for me is that people can still smoke which can sometimes be a drag!

data.title: Vacation
data.text: Great hotel.  Beautiful room and bath. We were on the 11 th floor and the view of the river was awesome. People were very nice. The room was so clean and very comfortable beds. The casino was great and we would recommend Samstown to everyone

data.title: Best Service All Around from a Casino!
data.text:
Ok, Sam's Town has kept my business and will continue!! Since previous reviews, I have seen some downers but great uppers! The down side of things, the pool is being taken for granted. Unfortunately, people who don't belong there like to take things that don't belong to them at the pool or destroy things. Sadly to say, all the bar stools that the bar had are now gone due to people abusing the seats ie: throwing in pool, jumping off of, etc. they are not replacing, so I have been  told. The grill for cooking hotdogs and so on..destroyed as well! Sam's Town you could replenish just by simply having someone (during peak season) set at the podium upon entry and make sure the people have a room and the required amount per room. Make them show their id's and verify room with a computer installed for the clerk. Have security set in an area outside or even in the air conditioned fitness facility to watch at all times. Where there's a will there's a way! Let us beat those people who take advantage and do something. During peak season, like I have stated before, set a band outside on one end of the pool area. this would draw a crowd back to the pool and the bar service would pick up as well.
As for the upper side of things, all I can say is WOW! I love the changes that were made with your tier program. Being a Sapphire member for awhile now, I love the new perks of having a Host. I feel that was the right thing to do. I spend a good amount of money there to obtain this level of recognition and appreciate what is given to me. I utilized the 1 hour slot hold this last visit to cash in a ticket and the staff was very nice and quick to help. My rooms I am receiving are stupendous with one little exception on the last trip, the phone between the bed was missing everything..buttons and information?? The room was clean, accommodative and temperature was excellent. As for the housekeeper on the floor, super work, Needed more ashtrays and was given within 5 minutes. 
Lastly, I want to shout out to the BEST HOST I have ever gotten, BERKELIA PLAYER!! This host is one to hold on to and highly recognize. She has gone out of her way to accommodate me every time I have requested something, If you want to be treated right and made to feel like you are a person...SAM'S TOWN is the one in a multitude of ways...My home away from home!

data.title: Great day at Sam's Town
data.text: My husband and I played 25$ blackjack @sams town had the best dealer in the house her name was Tanya she made our visit fun and pleasant we won 3,500. And she got great tips from us olive sams town this was Sept.275th going back soon hoping for a repeat

data.title: Sam's Town stay
data.text: The décor of the room is calming.  The furnishings were comfortable and in good condition.  The casino is quite small and is on multiple floors due to it having to be over water.  We had breakfast one morning at a restaurant on the first floor.  They serve large portions, but it took a while for the food to be brought to our table and it was not as hot as it should have been.  The property is in a good location close to other casinos and the outlet shopping center.

data.title: Needs a face lift for the a/c. Heating.
data.text: Nice rooms but so much not working. Entry light out, floor lamp broken and air heating controls so old they do not work. Wonderful employees will repair when you call but not able to flx a/c controls. Too old to repair! No quality control person to check the rooms to assure all is working. Casino nice and clean. Never had anyone offer drinks in casino. Seems they have cut down on personal.

data.title: Visit Sam's Town Hotel & Casino Shreveport LA
data.text: The hotel is First Class. Very nice rooms, plenty of room, comfortable beds, nice decor. The Casino was different, I could smell the cigarette stench before I went inside. The casino was laid out on three floors and there was no non smoking areas. For a non smoker the atmosphere was awful. The three floors were accessible be stairs and one eve later.

data.title: Nice Room, and not a bad price for the holiday weekend!
data.text: Very impressed with the non-smoking 19th floor, no hint of a smoke smell in the room, it was quiet, king bed was comfortable.  We ate at the three of the restaurants, the buffet, the deli, and Smokey Joe's - the catfish at the buffet and Smokey Joe's was cooked perfectly, with a light breading, so it wasn't too heavy.  Everything we sampled at the buffet was good.  We visited the buffet around 8pm, excellent considering the time we stopped there for dinner.  Definitely the nicest stay at Sam's Town Shreveport so far!  Will be coming back again.

data.title: It was cheap and we had fun !
data.text: We can't on an anniversary trip and had a good time. We ate outside if the hotel .. Oh we did do the buffet.. It was good not a bunch of selection. The casino was fun. For the price is exceeded our expectation.

data.title: Comfortable Beds!
data.text: Those beds were so comfortable that I was sad we were checking out. We had a great view from our room. Sure, it's a casino, but the lobby wasn't even that smoky. The service was wonderful! Definitely will be coming back here.

data.title: Nice Stay
data.text: We stayed over Labor Day weekend and really enjoyed our stay. The rooms are very spacious! We requested two riverside rooms but had to wait until almost 5pm for the rooms to be ready. I can't say enough about the bartender at the pool Jerry (JC) we spent a lot of time at the pool and he made our stay really enjoyable. I wasn't that impressed with the casino here but that isn't a deal breaker for me.
